text:
Hello camp/stargazing crew!

*Who*: <@U04185JLG8M> <@U02UAQKR56C> <@U040V1EQYMS> <@U0495G3QQ1W> <@U02MANZL55F> <@U04184BSKM3> <@U041PH0B1DF> <@U04S6L1NS9M> <@U05NS6MBHNE> + Cherie
Who for the day: <@U01N1775WSU>
*When*: Sept 9, 2023
*Time*: Meet at 1PM for a late lunch and mini hike! Then go to the house at check-in (I assume that’s 3PM right now)
*Rides*: For those who need a ride…. I think Karol, make sure to find your favorite friend to ride with or DM me to find you someone. I also need someone nearest riding past Buckhead/Lenox Marta :pray:

Here’s what’s happening, more people have joined, which is great. So after reading what ya’lls wanted at a glance (ie. bond fire, hot tub, price points, activities) mixed with knowing what you guys really want (I.e. entertainment, sleep semi-comfortably, and connecting with your fellow friends with practicality (e.g. a hot tub for 4 is not going to entertain us all)). I found two different fantastic places, but there’s a trade off….

ALSO understand there’s a high chance you’ll be sharing a bed.
So find someone you trust who won’t kick ya at night if you haven’t already.
And there’s a tiny chance you’ll get a cool bunk alone…with others in the room :upside_down_face:

*Where:* (VOTE once more ASAP please, thank you--
I mainly worry about the bougiest (<@U040V1EQYMS>) + the most energetic (<@U02UAQKR56C>) + everyone, but back to business, here they are:
:one: Closer to Atlanta, no hot tub, golf, random games like pool, and a tennis court nearby, but no hot tub, in Jasper, GA.  I would propose we either drive up to Blue ridge, grab lunch and check out the town at 1PM (37 min from Jasper), then hike the trail by the house for those who want, and check in at 3PM to do more sports (tennis, pool, golf, walk, relax, your hw). Gas firepits…maybe we can grill for dinner! Lots of picnic tables. S_o if you *haven’t joined yet, but want to, we probably have room for 4 more* in this house if we wanted. And if we’re desperate we maybe can open it up to OMSCS friends. (_<https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/871953381644885702?adults=8&check_in=2023-09-09&check_out=2023-09-10&source_impression_id=p3_1693512561_o33tZ2LvnWJYyx61&previous_page_section_name=1000&federated_search_id=cd73c459-9ba3-4986-b181-4027c08165bd|https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/871953381644885702?adults=8&check_in=2023-09-09&check_o[…]1000&federated_search_id=cd73c459-9ba3-4986-b181-4027c08165bd>_) ------> updating house because last one had a minimum_ 
:two: Has one hot tub (~4 at a time), and if you wanted to go tubing down some river, they have tubes! I just don’t know how warm it will be in Sept….but perhaps not terrible or we can bond suffering together? At night, when it gets cold, there is pool, darts, tv and of course games we bring. Oh and in the morning, you might spot a deer. And there’s fishing spots. After fees and taxes, _*I’ll be requesting $79.78 via Venmo*_ or Zelle tomorrow 8/31, however if more people join, I’ll send a difference. So if you _haven’t joined but want to, we probably have rom for 1 more here_. (<https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/554281239189102763?adults=8&check_in=2023-09-09&check_out=2023-09-10&source_impression_id=p3_1693455540_rgfBZWfjL%2FPBhYuc&previous_page_section_name=1000&federated_search_id=d8a808f2-87c7-447d-98eb-14f5c60d03ca|https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/554281239189102763?adults=8&check_in=2023-09-09&check_o[…]1000&federated_search_id=d8a808f2-87c7-447d-98eb-14f5c60d03ca>)

So there you have it, two places, both country, but with different amenities to accommodate ya’ll!  Please choose :one: or :two:, and I’ll book by about 3PM tomorrow! Oh  I almost forgot my :three: fine with whichever!

If we get super bored, I will bring cards……. and teach you a game I enjoy playing o_o it’s called Big 2(<https://www.scribd.com/document/256536761/Cho-Dai-Di-Big-2-Rulebook#>), if you want to learn the rules in advance, it’s a lot like poker, but not. I don’t drink, nor am I encouraging it, but apparently it’s a great drinking game for those who do.

PS for those who I do not have the Venmo sn of please DM it to me.
I’ll mass send a request shortly after I book.
It’ll be from _@intheparkco_ with my heart logo!

I appreciate your cooperation in reading these fun posts that I much enjoy writing :wink:

Await my next messages!
Cherie Lum

text:
Hello camp/getaway/stargazing crew!

I got us an airbnb finally. Thanks for the votes.

*Who*: <@U04185JLG8M> <@U02UAQKR56C> <@U040V1EQYMS> <@U0495G3QQ1W> <@U02MANZL55F> <@U04184BSKM3> <@U041PH0B1DF> <@U04S6L1NS9M> <@U05NS6MBHNE> <@U8QDSG1G9>

*Who for the day*: <@U01N1775WSU> + Sister (if anybody else wants to join for the day or have lunch with us in BlueRidge feel free to! <!channel>)
*When*: Sept 9, 2023- September 10, 2023
*Time*:
1. Meet at 12:30PM, eat + shop/explore Blue ridge till 2:30PM!! 
    a. if any foodies wants to take a stab at choosing a restaurant that looks good I’d appreciate it! 
2. Drive back 2:30PM
    a. Raid a Walmart or grocery store along the way for snacks/dinner. 
3. Be at house around 2:30-2:45PM and split up 
    a. grab some tubes- 10 of them or hike/golf**
    b. (Official check-in is at 4pm- but he said if nobody earlier we can take)
4. Dinner around 5-8PM --> any chefs? grillers? or we can eat out/order in too 
5. Evening activities (hot tub sits 6-7, s’more eaters + fire, card gammers***, stargazers)
**Guests can also purchase day passes from the Coosawattee River Resort to enjoy the heated Indoor pool, out door pools, game room, fitness room, 18 hole put put golf and tennis. Call the CRR for more info and to purchase passes.

***Future idea: we should all rent a room and play Age of Empire multiplayer. Is that too weird? Probably. Moving on……..

*Rides*: For those who need a ride…. I think Karol, make sure to find your favorite friend to ride with or DM me to find you someone. I also need someone nearest riding past Buckhead/Lenox Marta :pray:

*Where*: Ellijay, GA ---> Will update with address within 3 days of 9/9

PS for those who I do not have the Venmo sn of please DM it to me.
I’ll mass send a request shortly after I book.
It’ll be from _@intheparkco_ with my heart logo!

PS Apparently there’s fishing, so if you have poles and want to catch dinner……… I’d be impressed. I think there’s catfish……. which can be tasty when fresh. Does anyone fish?

Await my messages,
Cherie Lum
